snippet.title: MINDCOP - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
The Mindcop and his partner in crime Linda need your help on a murder investigation! Are you in? 🕵️‍♀️ Dive into the minds of the suspects and unravel their lies to catch the true killer in 5 days!  Coming in Q4 2024 on PC, Nintendo Switch and PS5! 🧠 Wishlist now: https://www.mindcopgame.com/

🏄‍♀️ What is Mindcop about?
Mindcop is a non-linear „whodunnit“ detective game. It mixes a story driven adventure with real-time puzzle gaming. As the infamous Mindcop, you can dive into the minds of your suspects to uncover their secrets and unravel their lies.

Mindcop is developed by Andre Gareis and published by Dear Villagers

Follow us:
🖤 Twitter: https://x.com/dearvillagers
🤍 Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mindcopgame
